WorkItem.Description:
Hey, as my title says, rawr isn't displaying gems that are mixed (i.e. spirit/sp, crit/sp, etc), just the pure ones (23 sp, 20 str, 30 stam). Could someone tell me why this is?
 
Version: 2.3.6
Type: moonkin model
 
File attatched which is the one I'm looking at. I've tried quitting and reopening Rawr, didn't work. I've tried opening a new character, still can't change gemming, so it's not a localised issue.
 
Thanks!
 
Jarob
WorkItem.Summary: [Moonkin] Mixed gems not available for custom gemming
